comments.body:
I took this from

https://github.com/tildeio/router.js/blob/bb16c56396ef68416fac80fe7e4fb493ce2bed42/lib/router/transition.ts#L42

Which also exports a `type PublicTransition = Transition<any>;`

https://github.com/tildeio/router.js/blob/bb16c56396ef68416fac80fe7e4fb493ce2bed42/lib/router/transition.ts#L20

I left the type arguments in, as they may be useful in the future?
Would be good to add a test for this.
This is a separate bugfix I noticed that brings it more inline with `Promise` and matches the actual behavior.
